synopsis.text: Sayaka's heart beats for Akihiko, her coworker at the bustling Pia Carrot restaurant. Before she can reveal her affection, she's whisked away to a new branch of the eatery, nestled on a sun-soaked beach for the summer season. Despite the allure of her new surroundings and the camaraderie of her fellow waitresses, Sayaka's thoughts remain tethered to Akihiko. As she navigates her new life, her longing for Akihiko intensifies, leaving her to wonder if he harbors similar feelings. Will the summer's end bring them closer, or will Sayaka's love remain unspoken? This heartwarming tale unfolds as the first feature film adaptation of an eroge.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
